title: Animals in winter
creator_credit: Heinz Sielmann and Heinz Sielmann Productions
brief_description: The behaviour in winter of squirrels, hamsters, insects, frogs, butterflies and other creatures, showing how they cope with the rigours of cold and the shortage of food in order to survive until the spring. Intended for primary and secondary schools
